mapper.select: SELECT R_CODE, R_NAME, R_DATE, R_CONTENTS, R_RATE, R_RECOMMEND FROM REVIEW WHERE R_ID = #{R_ID}
SELECT R_NUM, R_CODE, R_NAME, R_DATE, R_CONTENTS, R_RATE, R_RECOMMEND FROM REVIEW WHERE R_CODE = #{R_CODE} ORDER BY R_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( R_NUM, R_ID, R_CODE, R_NAME, R_DATE, R_CONTENTS, R_RATE, R_RECOMMEND ) VALUES ( R_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{R_ID}, #{R_CODE}, #{R_NAME}, SYSDATE, #{R_CONTENTS}, #{R_RATE}, 0 )
